content.layer1: Not everyone can handle the truth
content.layer3: Which is why I lie more often

content.layer1: Good for you! I just have higher standards
Everything I've faced made me who I am

content.layer3: Perfect for guilt-tripping you about bad luck

content.layer2: You have the inner resources to succeed
content.layer3: Which is why we're selling you this $499 course
